alert.note: Alert for Brown (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 9:49AM CDT until April 24 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Cottonwood River Above Springfield affecting Brown County. Cottonwood River at New Ulm affecting Brown County. .Overnight heavy rainfall will cause Cottonwood River to reenter minor flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cottonwood River Above Springfield. * WHEN...From this evening to late Monday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 930 AM CDT Thursday, the stage was 21.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 24.0 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 24.0 feet on 04/26/1994. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
